alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 2:56PM CDT until April 04 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL RACINE AND KENOSHA COUNTIES... At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Union Grove, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotter near Bohners Lake reports quarter size hail. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Mount Pleasant, Pleasant Prairie, Sturtevant, Union Grove, Paddock Lake, Eagle Lake, Bristol, Paris, Brighton, Somers, Elmwood Park, and Kansasville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
